div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 349 Delos, 1909 (313) Burial: c. 85-80 B.C. (T) Contents: 11 AR. From excavations Athens: 4 New Style tetradr. 5 New Style dr. (incl. 1 Sullan) 2 New Style triob. Disposition: Athens Svoronos, JIAN 1913, pp. 40-1 † Thompson, Athens (Delos ΙΓ), p. 521 Hackens, BCH 1965, p. 516
